title: DNP3OutstationSessionConfigEvents (Struct)
text:
TYPE DNP3OutstationSessionConfigEvents : STRUCT
Parameters for outstation session related to event configuration.

rows.Name: binaryInputMaxEvents
rows.Comment: Binary Input event configuration - maximum number of events.

rows.Name: binaryInputEventMode
rows.Comment: Binary Input event configuration - event mode.

rows.Name: doubleInputMaxEvents
rows.Comment:
Double Bit Input event configuration - maximum number of
events.

rows.Name: doubleInputEventMode
rows.Comment: Double Bit Input event configuration - event mode.

rows.Name: binaryOutputMaxEvents
rows.Comment:
Binary Output event configuration - maximum number of
events.

rows.Name: binaryOutputEventMode
rows.Comment: Binary Output event configuration - event mode.

rows.Name: binaryOutCmdMaxEvents
rows.Comment:
Binary Output Command event configuration - maximum number
of events.

rows.Name: binaryOutCmdEventMode
rows.Comment: Binary Output Command event configuration - event mode.

rows.Name: analogInputMaxEvents
rows.Comment: Analog Input event configuration - maximum number of events.

rows.Name: analogInputEventMode
rows.Comment: Binary Input event configuration - event mode.

rows.Name: analogOutputMaxEvents
rows.Comment:
Analog Output event configuration - maximum number of
events.

rows.Name: analogOutputEventMode
rows.Comment: Analog Output event configuration - event mode.

rows.Name: analogOutCmdMaxEvents
rows.Comment:
Analog Output Command event configuration - maximum number
of events.

rows.Name: analogOutCmdEventMode
rows.Comment: Analog Output Command event configuration - event mode.

rows.Name: binaryCounterMaxEvents
rows.Comment:
Binary Counter event configuration - maximum number of
events.

rows.Name: binaryCounterEventMode
rows.Comment: Binary Counter event configuration - event mode.

rows.Name: frozenCounterMaxEvents
rows.Comment:
Frozen Counter event configuration - maximum number of
events.

rows.Name: frozenCounterEventMode
rows.Comment: Frozen Counter event configuration - event mode.

rows.Name: frozenAnalogInMaxEvents
rows.Comment:
Frozen Analog Input event configuration - maximum number of
events.

rows.Name: frozenAnalogInEventMode
rows.Comment: Frozen Analog Input event configuration - event mode.

rows.Name: truncateStrings
rows.Comment:
Set this to TRUE to truncate string to length specified by read variation,
which is the normally desired behavior. Setting this to false may send
a longer string than the variation specified. ie reading group 110
variation 10 would either truncate all strings to at most 10 bytes,
or if this parameter is FALSE would allow a longer string to be returned.
This behavior would be more like reading variation 0.

rows.Name: stringMaxEvents
rows.Comment: String event configuration - maximum number of events.

rows.Name: stringEventMode
rows.Comment: String event configuration - event mode.
